Articles.Content: I am having trouble in opening certain craft files from before 1.0. The files were made when I first got the game shortly after asteroids were added. The crafts worked up until 1.0 and after 1.0 only one of the crafts from the .24 region worked. I have a non-working curropt ksp.90 backed up and since it cannot be used and 1.1.3 doesn't acknowledge the  craft in the VAB how do I recover the crafts? The only one that worked was edited and now works superbly. Is there a way to download KSP .90 to use them or update them? I run KSP off of steam if this helps.

Some of the parts have been migrated to a new part file. This will cause ships with the old versions of these parts to contain defunct parts and it might be what's causing your bug. I know the Mk 1 Inline Cockpit is one such part but I don't know the others off the top of my head.
